svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Change in Global Hunger Index, 1992-2017 vs. Population growth
Change in Global Hunger Index, 1992-2017 (Global Hunger Index 2017)
Source: IFPRI 2017 Global Hunger Index, UN Population Division (2015)
Note: Downwards sloping line is line of best fit (predicted values from a linear regression)
